pages.text: When taking damage, you'll notice an indicator to the right of your hotbar which shows your $(#00a800)bodily well-being$(). You can $(#fca800)press H to view$() this menu in detail, and choose which limbs to apply a $(#00a8a8)healing item$() to.
$(#00a8a8)Healing Herbs$() are an item which can heal up to one $(#00a800)limb$(), and also adds $(#00a800)Regeneration$() for a brief time.
The $(#00a8a8)Plaster$() is a healing item which grants $(#00a800)Regeneration$() for a short time, and can also be used to heal up to one $(#00a800)limb$().
The $(#00a8a8)Bandage$() is slightly more powerful, healing up to three $(#00a800)limbs$() and giving higher $(#00a8a8)Regeneration$().
As you might expect, this $(#00a8a8)Morphine$() needle doesn't actually cure your ailments, but it will $(#00a800)make you temporarily immune to feeling injury$(), so it can be useful in a pinch.
A $(#00a8a8)Tonic$() is capable of healing $(#00a800)all your limbs$(), and also grants $(#00a8a8)Regeneration$() for a decent amount of time.
The ultimate healing item: a $(#00a8a8)Medikit$() will not only heal all your $(#00a800)limbs$(), but it will give you a high level of $(#00a8a8)Regeneration$() for a decent amount of time.
